thread.title: Yorkshire BioBank BioEden to receive stem cells from Poland
thread.title_full: Yorkshire BioBank BioEden to receive stem cells from Poland - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Yorkshire BioBank BioEden to receive stem cells from Poland
text:
BioEden the pioneers and specialists in tooth stem cell banking add Poland to the list of countries who choose this leading biobank as their partner of choice
(PRWEB UK) 15 October 2015
Today Medicover announced that they have selected BioEden the Yorkshire based Biobank as their preferred provider in stem cell banking.
Operational in 22 countries, and still growing, BioEden have chosen Yorkshire as their Headquarters, and will process and store the Medicover stem cells in the UK.
Group CEO Tony Veverka said, 'We are delighted to include Poland within our global operation and to offer our life saving service to the Polish people..We are in no doubt that UK Private Healthcare companies will be swift to offer the same excellence in service to their Members'.
We are proud that a BioEden is recognised as a world leader, and we will continue work hard every day to ensure that are potentially life saving services are accessible and affordable to all.
For more information contact info(at)bioeden(dot)com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13023146.htm
